title: Looking for a mid laner or a support for flex queue
body:
My friend and I are  grinding during the school holidays and are planning to aim for gold or even plat. We are looking for a good mid laner or even a support to make grinding easier. My rank is silver 3 and my friends rank is silver 1. We are looking for a player who can play during at least 9:30am-4pm AWST 
My main role is adc and my friends main role is top 
Add me if your interested

replies.body: Added you (jg main) but can really do any role. This is my smurf account anyways. Main account is currently g3, was plat last season.

added you (mid main) but can support if wanted/needed
.
